input.sentences: the couple had looked for months for a home | especially one for their baby .
they entered the foyer and were immediately surprised at the size..
and | the house already had a room that was perfect for a little boy ...
and | even a playground out back !
it was | truly | the perfect home .
output.sentences: The family spent months looking for the a new house.
They were surprised to find one that they liked so quickly.
It was the perfect house with a great room for their son.
The yard already had a playground too!
Everyone was so happy to finally have the perfect home.
